newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - April 22.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - April 22.

text.p: Following is a summary of major political and business stories in local newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Shanghai. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.

- SHANGHAI SECURITIES NEWS - The China Securities Regulatory Commission, the securities watchdog, will consider the listing of 32 shareholding firms, which issued shares in the late 1980s or early 1990s but were barred from listing due to various problems.
- An international seminar held in Bejing stressed the need to control risk on the financial markets.
- BUSINESS NEWS - Experts said China must keep its urban unemployment rate at no more than five percent during the Ninth Five-year Period from 1996 to 2000.
- A commentary said the central bank, the People's Bank of China, is unlikely to cut bank interest rates in the short term.
